Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: (Ndinopika) neusiku apo paunosvika
Nemasikati apo paanobwinya
Neavo vakasika chirume nechikadzi
Zvirokwazvo, simba nemabasa enyu akasiyana siyana
Kune uyo anopa (zvipo) uye achitya Allah
Uye achitenda mune zvakanaka (Laa ilaaha illallaah â€“ Hakuna ane kodzero yokunamatwa kunze kwaAllah; kana kuti mubairo kubva kuna Allah)
Tichava tinomurerutsira nzira yakanaka
Asi uyo asingapi (anonyima), uye achifunga kuti mupfumi (haana chaanoda kubva kune umwe munhu)
Uye achiramba Al-Husna (zvakanaka: Laa ilaaha illallaah, kana kuti mubairo kubva kunaAllah)
Tichava tinomurerutsira nzira yakaipa
Uye hupfumi hwake huchamubatsira chii paachawira pasi (mumatambudziko)
Zvirokwazvo, kwatiri ndiko kune nhungamiro
Uye zvirokwazvo kwatiri ndiko kune magumo nemavambo (upenyu hwepano pasi neuchatevera)
Naizvozvo ndinokuyambirai nezvemoto unopisa (Gehena)
Hapana achaupinda kunze kweavo vachange vasina mufaro
Avo vanoramba vofuratira
Uye Al-Muttaqoon (vatsvene, vanhu vanotya Allah) vachaiswa kure nawo (moto weGehena)
Uye anopa hupfumi hwake kuti azvichenese
Uye uyo asiri kuripa chakanaka chaakaitirwa naani zvake
Kunze kwekuti achitsvaga chiso (kufadza) chaTenzi vake vepamusoro-soro
Uye zvirokwazvo mushure maizvozvo, achava anofara (paachapinda Paradhiso)
